document_data.name: Skiprock
document_data.creator: [[Halfling]]s
document_data.mainbody: '''Skiprocks''' were specially made, polished stone projectiles invented by [[halfling]] weaponsmiths
document_data.Weaponology:
Skiprocks were finely weighted and shaped to ensure they were perfect for throwing. If thrown well enough, after hitting a target they would typically ricochet and hit another.

Besides their use as pure projectiles, skiprocks were known to be used as [[bullet]]s for [[slings]] or the heavy [[warsling]]. However, when shot from a sling they typically did not ricochet.
document_data.Notable Users of Slingrocks: Skiprocks were primarily wielded by halflings, They were also a standard weapon in the arsenal of any [[warsling sniper]].
